com.headwire.testing.cq.pageobjects

Class BaseAuthorPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.headwire.testing.cq.pageobjects.BasePage
      • com.headwire.testing.cq.pageobjects.BaseAuthorPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorPage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorPage56, AuthorPage60, AuthorPage61

    public class BaseAuthorPage
extends BasePage
implements AuthorPage
    Provides helper methods to perform actions on WCM author pages Version AEM 5.6
    Author:
    Diran Samarjian
